transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ji namaste good morning kaise ho sir aap
Executive: Good morning bahut sab badhiya
Executive: Sir aapko na profile pe mail aaya tha mere paas ye kuch rating ke regarding aaya tha sir shayad aapne kisi buyer se rating
Executive: ke liye bola ho aur wo non genuine consider hui hai hamare panel pe to iski wajah se team hame mail kar rahi hai
Customer: matlab kya
Executive: ki is tarike ki cheeze nahi karni hai matlab sir jaise hamare tracker laga hota hai rating ko identify karne ke liye ki kis buyer ka genuine rating hai kis ka nahi hai to wo hamare backend me team baithi hai to uske through wo cheeze jo hai wo track karti hai to shayad abhi recently ek do rating pe unko non genuine rating consider kiya hai team ne aur uske regarding unhone bataya ki aapko update karne ke liye is tarike ki rating ko lekar cheeze nahi aage follow karne ke liye
Customer: kya sir
Executive: jaise sir maan ke chalo aapne kisi buyer kisi buyer ne aapko message nahi kiya ya buylead genuine nahi hui ya baat hi nahi hui aapki unse fir bhi us buyer ne aapko rating de diya
Customer: kya koi aur dikhta hoga aapke usme
Executive: to ye jo hai na isko non genuine consider karte hai ya bina genuine ke jo hai buyer ne dal diya
Customer: na buyer ka naam wo wo utha kar diya
Executive: kya sir
Customer: buyer ka naam
Executive: ek minute recently kuch dekho rating aapki remove hui hogi five star wali
Customer: ek minute check karo aap
Customer: ek minute
Executive: 4.5 ki rating aa rahi hai aapki
Executive: to ye hamara kehna hai na ki dekho buyer aur supplier ki mutual understanding se rating wala jo hai process hai har ek platform pe hai B2B me hai B2C me hai to wo ek trust create karta hai agar genuine tarike se rehta hai to buyer ka bhi right hai aur seller ko bhi jo hai apni rating pe kaam karna hota hai
Customer: na jaise kaun sa buyer tha
Executive: kya sir
Customer: matlab kaun sa buyer hai jisse rating galat de di
Executive: ek bar check karo aap aapki rating me ja kar
Customer: nahi nahi pata hai ka problem hota hai na sir isliye mail aa rahi hai
Executive: nahi nahi reminder me aapko de du gentle reminder hai ki thoda sa is cheezo ka dhyan rakhe aapko blame nahi kar rahe hai
Customer: acha main aisa main batau aapko mere paas abhi kuch ek buyer aaya haldwani se unhe maine 200 bottle di achi delivery aur ab jaise unhe maine bottle di achi delivery to wo kuch buyer mere paas google se aate hai aur google search karke direct aate hai ab unse agar hum kehte hai agar unse hum kehte hai na matlab seedha iska review dal dena to unke paas link nahi hota kehte the direct link nahi khul raha aap hame link bhejo to unse hum ye kehte hai ki bhai aapko hum link bhej rahe hai aap hame jo hai na wo bhejiye wo main inquiry uske baad main link share kar dunga ya to link ka process aisa bataiye
Executive: yahi wala process hua hai sir yahi wala yahi track hua hai google wala na ek bar main confirm batati hu team ko jo hamari rating team hai ki is tarike ki cheeze hui hai google se buyer aaya tha aur uske baad jo hai wo rating dene ke liye bol raha tha
Customer: do char kuch buyer aise aate hai jo google se search kiya direct unhone contact number liya mujhe call kar liya abhi tak 10 buyer aisa aaya is beech me ab jaise humne delivery puri kar di unse unhe sab saman de diya acha acha sab kuch raha unse kehte hai ki sir isme aap review dal dena to wo bechare koshish karte hai to review pahuch nahi pata to wo kehte hai ki aap hame link share kar dijiye ab link hum kaise kare ki wo lead manager pe pata hai nahi to hum unse kehte hai hum unse matlab main unse kehta hu ki sir aap mujhe inquiry dal dijiye main aapko link share kar dunga to aisa hua ek do bar
Executive: ha wahi wahi wahi wala consider hua hoga sir wahi track hua hoga google wale buyer ka ha to aap mujhe aisa bataiye
Customer: to wo link kaise share kar sakte hai hum direct
Executive: to wo kya google wale jo buyer the aapke wo india mart me aake unhone inquiry nahi dali thi sir unka direct deal hua tha aap se
Customer: wo direct call kar lete hai do char buyer aise aate hai mere paas aur jisse business bhi achcha raha aur kaam bhi sahi raha
Executive: hmm to uska solution hai main aapko bataungi theek hai uska solution hai sir aap mujhe kuch aisa process bataiye jisse ab jaise ajmer me hai monika ji unhe do bar saman de chuka hu india mart ke through maine unhe link share kara to wo bechari bahut koshish karte hai wo kehte hai par mumtaz bhaiya main review dalne ki koshish kar rahi hu aapka link open nahi ho raha ya to koi link aisa bata dijiye link main unhe apne paas se follow karu
Executive: wo baat sahi hai mumtaz sir lekin abhi india mart ka kya hai na ki india mart ke buyer ko hi hum log jo hai rating consider karte hai genuine ki wo india mart ke platform pe aaya aapko inquiry dali fir aapki lead manager me baat chit hui fir next day baat chit ke baad jo hai buyer ko sahi laga product uske baad next day usne rating dala to ye ek genuine tarika hota hai usko consider karne ka ab maan ke chalo google se koi same day aaya buyer achanak se lead manager me usne inquiry dali aur same day hi unhone rating dal diya to wo waha pe suspicious count hota hai
Customer: ab jaise gaurav gaurav gupta hai ab wo mere paas google se aaya google se unhone mujhse 100 set kharide ek bottle do glass hai google se aaye the wo ab maine unse kaha to fir wahi maine unhe yahi process bataya ki aap mujhe link share kariye wo inquiry daliye main aapko link share karta hu aap review dal dena to aisa hua
Executive: wo main samajh gayi aapko google ke through unhone jo hai direct approach kiya tha but ha wo sir land nahi ho paye na india mart pe isliye wo dikkat aayi hai ek bar main iska solution pata karke aapko proper bataungi ki kaise hum ispe kaam kar sakte hai agar google se koi buyer aa rahe hai to usme hum kaise link share kare
Customer: ha hmm hmm to link share karne ka wahi sir google ke through aa rahe hai na to google ka link jata hai unka google pe bhi to rating review di jati hai to uska ek alag link hota hai to wo link ke through jo hai jati hai ab wo india mart pe aaye hi nahi to yaha pe jo hai wo non genuine consider ho gaye wo dikkat hai baki ek bar aap mujhe time do main ispe na apni rating team se discuss karke jo bhi wo batayenge ki yahi proper solution hai aise kar sakte hai is case me to main aapko bataungi ab jaise ab jaise do char buyer ne to mujhe rating achi de di ha ab ek buyer ne mujhe mera review kam de diya rating kam di to waha par mera ek point kam ho jata hai ab jaise ye kya naam tha inka rahul shah nikal diya rahul shah m ke wale ha rahul shah the ha to ye agar sahi galat hai to meri rating badh jayegi
Executive: kya hota hai na inko ye dal to dete hai uske baad jab inko guide karo to unko lagta hai ki matlab pata nahi kya fraud activity ho rahi hai paise kat jayenge to fir wo process wo follow hi nahi karte hai to ye hai na agar by chance galti se ho jata hai uske baad uska solution pe wo kaam hi nahi karte kuch buyer ka to aisa hota hai ab maan lijiye wo jyada utna jante nahi hai iske bare me online to kisi bhi link pe click karne se bachte hai
Customer: ab jaise rahul shah hai ab rahul shah se mera koi business nahi koi delivery nahi koi kuch nahi lead manager pe aaye the wo unhone meri site dekhi thi hmm hmm one star de diya m ke shah ne one star de diya to do teen log aise jinhone main aapko jaldi jaise ye galat hai to isko to remove honi chahiye na ab jaise sagar hai ye remove honi chahiye jinhe main janta hi nahi jo lead manager pe aaye nahi to ye hai
Executive: sagar ji wala to mujhe ek screenshot de dijiye rahul shah wale ka ek screenshot hai already aur m ke mittal wala bhi aapne bheja hua hai to ye do teen rating to team ko main submit kar deti hu aaj hi waise maine call kiya tha apni side se but wo kuch sahi ho nahi paya solution to ye karke main aapko update karti hu hopefully rahul shah aur m ke mittal wala hat jayega aur ye jo aapne bataya ek rahul singh bataya na inka bhi bhej dena maharashtra se hai ye inka bhi bhej dena aap unse bhi kaam karwate hai theek hai ab jaise sagar hai sagar sahab ne mujhe 20 20 lakh ka order diya 10 lakh advance diye maine 12 lakh 70 hazar ka material bhej diya unse kaha payment wo bole aap order pura kare jab payment karunga wo main waha par mere 2 lakh 70 hazar fas gaye aur rating bhi unhone galat dal di review one star dal diya
Executive: to abhi kitna kitna time lagega sir order complete hone me
Customer: maine to wo order karne se mana kar diya na diwali ka order tha matlab wo mere sath me office me aaya hai ghume fire maine mere ghar par raha hai ghume fire sab kuch achi service pehle review bahut achcha dala unhone ab jab maine material ko mana kar diya maine sir payment kare aap main material bhejunga jab fir 2 lakh 70 hazar mere abhi unke upar due hai hmm to unhone advance payment kitna kiya tha sir
Customer: unhone order diya tha mujhe 24 lakh 70 56 hazar ka advance diya tha 10 lakh ka aur maine bahut request jab unka order me mujhe 2 lakh 2 lakh ke aas pass ka nuksan bhi hua aur 12 lakh 70 hazar ka maine material bhej diya 12 lakh ka material aapne bhej diya ha aur 10 lakh ka hi unhone saman 10 lakh ka hi payment kiya tha advance 10 lakh se payment kiya tha hmm to ab 2 lakh jab aapne aur aapne manga to wo diya nahi unhone aisa 2 lakh 70 aapke upar due hai
Executive: samajh gayi sir inse baat karne ki zarurat hai kya sir ya aap log deal kar rahe ho apne tarike se
Customer: sir wo to main khud hi karunga lekin ye karte hai review jaise ye rahul wala hai rahul hai aur m ke matter hai inka rakh
Executive: deti hu baki sir sagar ji se ek bar aap se problem milke solve karo kyuki advance wala jo hai na ye thoda sa term and condition pe dependancy hoti hai person to person pe depend karta hai ki uske dimag me kya strike ho raha hai usse thoda sa politely agar aap baat karoge buyer ko samjhaoge to tarike se cheeze jo hai agar fir bhi zarurat lagega to aap batana hum ek bar call kar lenge india mart se agar koi dikkat hai theek hai sir sahi hai sir meeting ke liye bhi ek bar time bata dijiyega kab kar sakte hai meeting lunch ke baad kar sakte hai
Customer: main kuch kaam hai isliye kar lo uske baad kar theek hai thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding non-genuine ratings on profile.

- How to share direct link with Google buyers.

- Buyers are not able to put reviews.

- Facing issues with payment from a buyer.



Resolution:

- Explained about genuine and non-genuine ratings.

- Executive will confirm with the rating team.

- Executive assured to update on the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after confirmation.



Alert (If Any):

- refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification, ratings, buyleads
